PathOfBuilding.Notes:
storm arrows : 4 totem * 5 proj * 3,14aps = 62 arrows planted beams = 62 arrows / 2 (1beam=2arrows) * 2,5 hit rate = 77,5 beams that actually hit = 77,5 * 66% = 51 damage = 51 * 98k damage = 5m
need : - ailments (bleed, poison, ignite, freeze, shock, curses) : 3-4 flasks, bubonic -50% duration, rare jewels -50% duration/avoid/effect?, unique jewel -50% avoid - onslaught: can have on belts of jewels - blind: smoke mine, jewels 5% chance, annoint?, cluster, watcher's grace - endurance charges: annoint?
